unnormalised: I remember my grandfather telling me that India got independence on 15/08/1947, and the celebrations went on for days; he said everything changed after that 12:00 AM. He also mentioned that the Quit India Movement started on 08/08/1942, which was a significant event leading to independence.
normalised: I remember my grandfather telling me that India got independence on fifteenth August nineteen forty seven, and the celebrations went on for days; he said everything changed after that twelve A M. He also mentioned that the Quit India Movement started on eighth August nineteen forty two, which was a significant event leading to independence.
